meanings.definition: A wild party or celebration involving excessive indulgence in sensual pleasures.
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood threw an orgy to celebrate the end of summer.
meanings.sent2: The ancient Romans were known for their extravagant orgies.
meanings.sent3: The zoo animals had an orgy of fun during the annual costume party.
meanings.sent4: The colors at the sunset created an orgy of beauty in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The dessert buffet was an orgy of delicious treats.

meanings.definition: Unrestrained indulgence in a particular activity or pursuit.
meanings.sent1: The artist went on an orgy of painting, finishing five canvases in one day.
meanings.sent2: Her shopping spree was an orgy of spending, leaving her with empty pockets.
meanings.sent3: The puppies had an orgy of playtime in the park, rolling around in the grass.
meanings.sent4: The garden was an orgy of colors, with flowers blooming in every shade imaginable.
meanings.sent5: The book club meeting turned into an orgy of discussion, with everyone sharing their thoughts passionately.
